javelin.controller.upgrade

Class Spell

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.upgrade.Upgrade
      • javelin.controller.upgrade.Spell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blink, ControlWeather, DayLight, DeeperDarkness, DiscernLocation, DispelMagic, Doom, FindTraps, FlameStrike, GreaterTeleport, HoldMonster, LocateObject, Longstrider, MagicMissile, PryingEyes, RaiseDead, Ray, Ressurect, SecureShelter, SoundBurst, Summon, Touch, WordOfRecall

    public abstract class Spell
extends Upgrade
implements Cloneable
    Represents a spell-like ability. See the d20 SRD for more info. A spell can be manifested in Item form through several means but should choose only one: - A Potion (usually a self spell) - A Wand (usually a ranged spell) - A Scroll (everything else) Spells that can be castinbattle and castoutofbattle cannot have a components cost currently. TODO extract a SpellUpgrade class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • SPELLS

        public static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Spell> SPELLS
        Canonical list of all spells by lower-case name.

      • perday

        public int perday
        Number of times this spell can be cast before needing to rest. A maximum of 5 is enforced since in the Challenging Challenge Ratings document more than 5 casts per day represent the same CR.

      • used

        public int used
        Number of spent uses.

      • castoutofbattle

        public boolean castoutofbattle
        Set to true if can be cast outside of battle.

      • castinbattle

        public boolean castinbattle
        Set to true if can be used during combat.

      • castonallies

        public boolean castonallies
        Set to true if able to target allies.

      • automatichit

        public boolean automatichit
        Set to true if doesn't need to roll a touch attack.
        See Also:
        hit(Combatant, Combatant, BattleState)

      • isritual

        public boolean isritual
        Rituals are cast by NPCs in Shrines.

      • isscroll

        public boolean isscroll
        true if can automatically generate a Scroll for this.

      • ispotion

        public boolean ispotion
        Same as isscroll but for Potions.

      • iswand

        public boolean iswand
        Same as isscroll but for Wands.

      • provokeaoo

        public boolean provokeaoo
        If false will not consider this threatening (ignores attacks of opportunity so it can be cast while engaged without needing a Skills.concentration roll). Default: true.

      • apcost

        public float apcost
        How many action points to spend when casting (default: standard action).

      • casterlevel

        public java.lang.Integer casterlevel
        Level this spell is being cast at.

      • level

        public int level
        Spell level.

      • cr

        public float cr
        TODO Only ChallengeRatingCalculator and CrFactor system should know about this stuff.

      • components

        public int components
        Material components cost.

      • realm

        public final Realm realm
        Used to determine where each Scroll will be sold.

      • init

        Load spells.

      • calculatecasterlevel

        public static int calculatecasterlevel(int level)
        Returns:
        the minimum necessary caster level to cast a spell of given spell level.

      • info

        public java.lang.String info(Combatant m)
        Description copied from class: Upgrade
        To be show before upgrade confirmation, containing relevant information that might help decide to buy it or not. For example, a Spell could show how many times it can already be cast by the Combatant in question.
        Specified by:
        info in class Upgrade
        Returns:
        one line of text.

      • apply

        public boolean apply(Combatant c)
        Specified by:
        apply in class Upgrade
        Parameters:
        c - Given an unit apply the upgrade on it.
        Returns:
        false if this is not a valid update. For example: already reached the maximum level on a class, cannot learn this spell level yet.

      • cast

        public java.lang.String cast(Combatant caster,
                             Combatant target,
                             BattleState s,
                             boolean saved)
        Once the spell hits, apply effect.
        Parameters:
        s - Should modify this directly (no internal cloning).
        saved - true in case the target's saving throw was successful.
        Returns:
        Description of outcome.

      • filtertargets

        public void filtertargets(Combatant combatant,
                          java.util.List<Combatant> targets,
                          BattleState s)
        Parameters:
        combatant - Active unit.
        targets - Remove from this all unit that should not be considered targets.
        s - Current game state.

      • hit

        public int hit(Combatant active,
               Combatant target,
               BattleState state)
        By default is an automatic hit.
        Returns:
        Difficulty class target to be hit on a d20 roll or -Integer.MAX_VALUE for automatic hit.

      • exhausted

        public boolean exhausted()
        Returns:
        true if this spell has been cast to it's limit already before it's Combatant caster rests.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Upgrade

      • showleft

        public java.lang.String showleft()
        " (4/5)" - where 4 is the times this still can be cast before resting and 5 is the total perday uses.
        Returns:
        A description in the format above.

      • save

        public int save(Combatant caster,
                Combatant target)
        Returns:
        Integer.MAX_VALUE if it's an impossible roll; negative Integer.MAX_VALUE in case of an automatic success; or the minimum number needed to roll on a d20 for a successful saving throw. With the exceptions above numbers will be approximated into the range: ]2,19] to allow the ensuing roll of 1 to always be an automatic miss and 20 an automatic hit.
        See Also:
        #save(int, int, Combatant)

      • castpeacefully

        public java.lang.String castpeacefully(Combatant caster,
                                       Combatant target)
        Parameters:
        caster - Can be null if being cast from a Shrine.
        target - May be null if no targetting is necessary.
        Returns:
        A message to be displayed or null if feedback is handled internally.
        Throws:
        NotPeaceful - if should not be used out of combat.
        See Also:
        isritual

                                                  int radius,

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • rollsave

        public int rollsave(int savingthrow,
                    Combatant caster)
        Takes 10.
        Parameters:
        savingthrow - Value for the defending unit's saving throw bonus (fortitude, reflexes or will).
        caster - Attacking spellcaster.
        Returns:
        Target number that needs to be hit on a d20 roll for the defender to succesfully save against this spell or negative Integer.MAX_VALUE If the monster is immune to this type of save.

      • canbecast

        public boolean canbecast(Combatant caster)
        Parameters:
        caster - Spellcaster.
        Returns:
        true if this is allowed to be cast.

      • postloadmonsters
